english.segment1: I woke up this morning. And looked out my window. I could see the sun shining down on me. It reminded me of You. And of all that You do. And of all the love that You've shown to me
english.segment2: Your mercy oh Lord is new every morning. Your wisdom is waiting for me to ask. Though I might stumble. Though I lose my step now. Your grace is gonna cover what I lack
english.segment3: Thank You Lord. Oh thank You Lord. I am so thankful for a friend like You
english.segment4: Jesus Your love is better than life to me. Your goodness is always by my side. And why you love me is hard for me to see. But I love you Lord cause You've been so good to me
english.segment5: Though I may never be a scholar with a fancy degree. One thing I know for sure is that I love You. And You love me Lord
